name: Revenant (itch) (Riptide03)
description:
Seek Revenge

Fight, leap and dash through the multiple levels of Revenant in your search for revenge, in this short and challenging platformer fighter.

In this game you will

  • tear through many enemies on your path to revenge
  • weave through hazards with quick movment and dashes
  • overcome horrific beasts

Music by - Abstraction

Sound from - NES SFX PACK BY PROGROMANCER

Art, coding and design by Stan Clark
